description: Stabilize route / by improving event handling and latency.

operations.content:
# Improve event handling and latency
import time
def handle_event(event):
    start_time = time.time()
    # Process the event
    end_time = time.time()
    print(f'Event processed in {end_time - start_time} seconds')

# Improve event handling and latency
import time
def handle_event(event):
    start_time = time.time()
    # Process the event
    end_time = time.time()
    print(f'Event processed in {end_time - start_time} seconds')
